title:
棧柒庫 XR 劇院 VIVELAND 虛擬實境樂園 
 KW7 XR Theater VIVELAND Virtual Reality Park
content:
最多遊戲類型的虛擬實境樂園！
The park with the most game variety!

棧柒庫XR劇院 VIVELAND 虛擬實境樂園，體驗新世代娛樂的最佳去處！
KW7 XR Theater VIVELAND Virtual Reality Park is the best place to experience next-gen entertainment!

全新可移動式 5G XR 劇場，延續自熱門的永恆聖母院和巴黎舞會沉浸式 VR 體驗，使用新穎的VR頭戴式顯示器和實景娛樂技術，提供多人同步的沉浸式互動體驗。遊客可在棧柒庫園區內盡情探索虛/實中的精彩內容。
With a brand-new portable 5G XR theater, continuing from the popular immersive VR experiences like Eternal Notre Dame and The Paris Ball, we use the latest VR headsets and real-world entertainment technology to provide a multi-user interactive experience. Visitors can explore exciting virtual and real-world content throughout the KW7 park.

透過 5G 高傳輸速率及低延遲，享受流暢的視角轉換和高品質影像，無論是遊戲、劇場還是數位展演，都能在這裡找到最新鮮的數位內容體驗！
Enjoy smooth perspective shifts and high-quality visuals through 5G’s fast transmission and low latency. Whether you're into games, theater, or digital exhibitions, you’ll find the freshest digital content experience here!

體驗地點│高港棧7-2庫
地址│高雄市鼓山區蓬萊路1之15號
Location │ Kaohsiung Port Warehouse KW7-2
Address │ No. 15, Penglai Road, Gushan District, Kaohsiung City

title:
和高雄熊一起展開 5G AR 旅程！五大導覽點等你來探索！ 
 Join Kaohsiung Bear on a 5G AR Adventure! Explore 5 Amazing Tour Spots!
content:
歡迎加入高雄 5G AR 導覽體驗！總共有 5 個導覽點等你來發掘，每個地點都有超可愛的 3D 高雄熊陪你打卡合照，並完成有趣的任務！探索途中，別忘了在各導覽點蒐集專屬獎章，集滿所有獎章還有機會兌換限量好禮！
 Welcome to the Kaohsiung 5G AR Tour! There are 5 awesome spots waiting for you to explore, and at each one, you’ll find an adorable 3D Kaohsiung Bear for you to snap a photo with and complete fun tasks! Don’t forget to collect special badges at each spot—gather them all for a chance to redeem exclusive rewards! 
 按下「導覽點介紹」可以深入了解港灣每個景點的歷史與特色，按下「開始探索」，可愛的 3D 高雄熊就會現身，陪你一起展開這趟奇幻旅程！ 
 Press <Tour Spot Info> to dive deeper into the history and highlights of each location. And when you’re ready, press <Start Exploring> —your 3D Kaohsiung Bear will join you for an amazing adventure! 
 👉 小提醒：點擊右上角的 X 關閉此畫面，就可以立刻開始你的 AR 探險啦！
 👉 Quick Tip: Tap the X in the top-right corner to close this message and kick off your AR adventure right away!
